quote: There had been a subtle realignment of the spheres. The world was somehow a place I could endure again. If life was a grey corridor lined with doors, it was now within my power to open some of them.
quote_letters: THERE HAD BEEN A SUBTLE REALIGNMENT OF THE SPHERES THE WORLD WAS SOMEHOW A PLACE I COULD ENDURE AGAIN IF LIFE WAS A GREY CORRIDOR LINED WITH DOORS IT WAS NOW WITHIN MY POWER TO OPEN SOME OF THEM
